original_text: So Moses, Aaron and the people's leaders recorded the names of Kohath's descendants in their clans and in their families.
korean_text: 모세와 아론과 회중의 지도자들이 고핫 자손들을 그 종족과 조상의 가문에 따라 계수하니

sentences.original_text: So Moses, Aaron and the people's leaders
recorded the names of Kohath's descendants
in their clans and in their families
